name: King Speed Car Racing
description:
King Speed Car Racing is the racing driver's favorite street racing racing game where you can show off your driving ability.
In the game, the real racing, endless road, busy traffic, speed racing. To bring you the fastest driving experience, become the king of the car.
Features:
- the real environment and climate
- Simple and smooth game
- endless traffic
- all kinds of cool car
- amazing music and sound effects
- enjoy the pleasure of speed
- play anytime, anywhere
